personal.name: Suraj Kumar
personal.title: Computer Science Undergraduate & AI Enthusiast
about: Enthusiastic computer science undergraduate with strong fundamentals in algorithms, operating systems, and networking. I am passionate about leveraging technology to build innovative and secure applications, with a focus on full-stack web development and applied AI.

Currently pursuing my B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering at Galgotias University, where I maintain a CGPA of 8.3. Recently completed comprehensive coursework in Full Stack Web Development, gaining hands-on experience with the MERN stack and integrating Generative AI into modern applications.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: Online Doctor Appointment & AI Health Summary System
projects.description: A comprehensive healthcare platform featuring secure doctor-patient communication with AI-powered health summaries and intelligent appointment scheduling using Gemini API.
projects.longDescription: Built a full-stack web application that revolutionizes healthcare communication. Features include real-time chat between doctors and patients, AI-generated health summaries based on patient data, secure appointment booking system, and integration with modern web technologies for optimal performance.

projects.title: Plant Analysis Tool
projects.description: A web application using Gemini AI to identify plant species from images and provide comprehensive care recommendations with a modern user interface.
projects.longDescription: Developed an intelligent plant identification system that leverages AI to analyze plant images and provide detailed information about species, care requirements, and health recommendations. The application features a clean, intuitive interface for easy plant management.

projects.title: Custom DNS Server
projects.description: A high-performance DNS server implementation in Java that simulates hierarchical query resolution with caching mechanisms for improved response times.
projects.longDescription: Implemented a custom DNS server from scratch using Java socket programming. The server handles DNS queries efficiently with hierarchical resolution, implements caching for faster responses, and supports various DNS record types with proper error handling.

projects.title: Face Recognition Attendance System
projects.description: An AI-powered system to automate attendance using face recognition, ensuring accuracy and security with real-time processing.
